title: 6S: Collaborative Web search via an adaptive peer network

author: Filippo Menczer, School of Informatics and Computing, Indiana University

So instead of creating a new vertical search engine all by myself and hope that everybody comes to my website, I can do that and just put that search engine within this peer community.
